TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件可处理异常 （例如，通过外部数据源） 控制的代码引发的。Handling the event lets you handle exceptions thrown by code outside your control (for example, by an external data source). 使用属性来确定的状态时的异常。Use the property to determine the state of the at the time of the exception. 使用属性来检索异常数据。Use the property to retrieve the exception data. 如果你想要按其他事件处理程序处理异常，设置属性设置为`true`。If you want to handle the exception by additional event handlers, set the property to `true`. 和属性通常指示在其中发生数据错误的单元格。The and properties normally indicate the cell in which the data error occurred. 当错误发生在外部数据源时，但是，数据源可能无法提供发生错误的列。When the error occurs in an external data source, however, the data source may not provide the column in which the error occurred. 在这种情况下，属性通常在错误发生时表示当前单元格的列。In this case, the property typically indicates the column of the current cell at the time of the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何应对所提供的信息类。The following code example demonstrates how to respond to information provided by the class. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成员可能会使用按位组合枚举`OR`运算符来表示数据绑定的状态在发生数据错误时。Members of the enumeration may be combined using the bitwise `OR` operator to represent the state of a data-bound when a data error occurred. 例如，如果用户输入无效的单元格值 （例如，在需要日期的单元格中输入的名称），然后选择不同的单元格，将尝试提交无效的单元格的值。For example, if a user enters an invalid cell value (such as entering a name in a cell that requires a date) and then selects a different cell, the will try to commit the invalid cell value. 如果提交失败，将引发事件其属性将具有值为和。When the commit fails, the will raise a event whose property will have a value of and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调查错误上下文。The following code example demonstrates how to investigate the error context. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要处理的多个异常，通过设置引发的异常处理程序结束时再次属性设置为`true`。To handle the exception by more than one , throw the exception again at the end of a handler by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检查属性。The following code example demonstrates checking the property. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`false`如果所表示的异常已处理属性，并且不希望传播到另一个异常的可能处理事件。Set this property to `false` if the has dealt with the exception represented by the property, and you do not want to propagate the exception to another that may handle the event. 出于调试目的，它可用于传播该异常并检查堆栈跟踪信息的环境相关的错误的信息。For debugging purposes, it can be useful to propagate the exception and inspect the stack trace for information regarding the context of the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用属性以指示不应引发异常。The following code example demonstrates using the property to indicate that the exception should not be thrown. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic.
